evidence.claim: The company uses AWS services for cloud infrastructure and data storage.
Comfort Keepers adheres to HIPAA regulations to ensure the privacy of patient information.
Integration with health data standards such as HL7 and FHIR for interoperability.
They implement REST APIs for service integration and data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on non-claims related services; no mention of X12 use cases found.
